//main:
o
addi $sp, $sp, -16 
00100011101111011111111111110000
4
sw $s0 , 0($sp) 
10101111101100000000000000000000
8
sw $t0, 4($sp)
10101111101010000000000000000100
12
addi $s0, $zero, 8
00100000000100000000000000001000
16
addi $t0, $zero, 1 
00100000000010000000000000000001

//loop
20
beq $s0, $zero, exit 
00010010000000000000000000000100
24
mult $t0, $s0
00000001000100000000000000 011000
28
mflo $t0
00000000000000000100000000 010010
32
addi $s0, $s0, -1
00100010000100001111111111111111
36
j loop
00001000000000000000000000000101

//exit
40
lw $t0, 4($sp)
10001111101010000000000000000100
lw $s0, 0($sp) 
10001111101100000000000000000000
addi $sp, $sp, 16
00100011101111010000000000010000
jr $ra
00000011111000000000000000001000
